paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant NM_000059.4:c.7977-1G>T, including clinical significance, patient demographics, and penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Specifically, six out of the 24 subjects (25%) were found to be related to genetic factors, i.e., either familial pancreatic cancer (n = 1), germline mutation (n = 4), or both (n = 1).

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as pathogenic and is predicted as a loss of function.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with pancreatic cancer in the patient.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on classification as pathogenic.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was previously reported in the ClinVar database.
key_quotes: one of which, a BRCA2 variant (NM_000059.4:c.7977-1G>T), was previously reported as pathogenic variant in ClinVar database.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the text.
